tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I did my root canal with Dr Pooja and I was happy that the entire process was pain free. I am really scared of dentists but everything changed after my this visit

I don't know how to start but still i will write about Dr. Pooja she's a kind girl & an awesome Doctor she treat's her patient like they are friends i visted her clinic (Dr. Manoj's clinic) in Khar West & at 1st i was feeling shy that how to talk to her but then she started talking to me & started asking what problems u have soo i decided to share my tooth problem she handle me with care & she explained me everything about Root canal & other useful things but i didn't understand a thing :p (sorry if you are reading this Dr. Pooja) then she took my X-ray with ease. The next day i was ready for my root canal & again without any complaint she handle me like my mother :) it was an honor to meet such a doctor these days who cares too much about you. Soo before getting started with my root canal she asked me if u will have pain then raise your hand we will stop for a minute or two. Soo the treatment started. Whenever i was having a pain she immediately stopped treatment & gave me some minutes to rest. That was very humble to her. Overall i want to say that Dr. Pooja is a great dentist i love her work & also her smile :D Make everyone smile Dr. Pooja

review: I visited the doctor via practo for my fillings.  I had to get around eight fillings done, had to keep visiting the doctor frequently because of that. Everytime I went the doctor would meet me with the same friendliness as the first time. One happy experience visiting the dentist here.

Probably the nicest doctor I've ever encountered. She was extremely cautious of my comfort throughout the procedure. If you live in that vicinity, don't even think twice to visit her.
The doctor is very warm and explained everything very well I got cleaning done from her. She did a very good job.
I visited the doctor to get my teeth extracted as they were all in very a very bad state. The doctordid my treatment like I was family, took very good care of me.
I'm happy with my procedure, my treatment was done very well. I'm glad I reached the right place. The staff is very sweet and polite too.
Very happy with my treatment, the doctor was very polite and answered all my questions. I don't have any pain now and can eat everything comfortably.
I visited the clinic to get a few fillings done. Dr Pooja did a very good job. My fillings look very natural. I myself cannot make out the difference between the filling and the natural tooth.
Visited the doctor with tremendous amount of pain, doctor started my treatment immediately. I'm very happy and pain free now.
I visited the clinic for my child's filling. He was in a lot of pain. He was treated so well that I don't think I'll ever have to worry about getting him to the dentist.
Good and friendly.she is doing good job in tooth filling. I am very impressive. I will recommend for my friends and relatives.
I keep visiting the doctor for fillings and extraction because of my age. The doctor is very patient with me and takes good care.
The doctor has a great touch.she is careful and thorough. I am very pleased with her.she is thoughtful in her explanations and provides great care.
Went to the doctor with a lot of pain. She was very very patient with me and explained the procedure very well. I'm happy and without pain now.
I had really yellow and really bad teeth and I would never smile in my pictures but now I'm very very happy with my smile.thank you.
